name: Debt-Free Dominica
title: Lowest External Debt
description: In 2015, Dominica had one of the lowest external debts in the world, with only $31,000 owed to the IBRD.

name: Green Transport Champs
title: Minimal Transport Emissions
description: In 2023, Dominica's transport sector emitted just 0.0001 Mt of methane and 0.0003 Mt of nitrous oxide, showcasing its commitment to green energy.

name: Waste Not, Want Not
title: Negligible Waste Emissions
description: Dominica's waste sector emitted a mere 0.0001 Mt of carbon dioxide in 2023, highlighting its effective waste management practices.

name: Savings Shortfall
title: Negative National Savings
description: In 2018, Dominica faced a challenge with a net national savings rate of -25.3% of GNI, indicating economic strain.

name: Safe Haven for Youth
title: Lowest Youth Mortality
description: In 2023, Dominica reported only one death among individuals aged 10-14, reflecting its strong healthcare and safety measures for the youth.

name: Import Imbalance
title: High Import Residuals
description: In 2023, Dominica's merchandise imports had a residual of 3.5% of total imports, indicating potential trade imbalances.
